Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,123 @@ +import React, { useState } from 'react' +import { ChangeDocNameSharpoint } from "../../../api/api" +import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' +export default function EditDocNameFOrm({ setApiCall, userId, name, docId, userType, show, close }) { + console.log(name.replace(/\.[^/.]+$/, "") + , "ppp", name.split(".")[1]) + const [newName, setNewName] = useState(name.split(".")[0]) + const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) + // const [errors, setErrors] = useState("") + /*FUnction to Edit Document Name */ + const onEditNameClick = async () => { + setLoading(true) + let UpdatedName = newName + "." + name.split(".")[1] + try { + let res = await ChangeDocNameSharpoint(userId, userType, UpdatedName, docId) + if (res.data.data.message === + "Document name updated successfully!") { + toast.success( + `Document Uploaded successfully`, + { + position: toast.POSITION.TOP_RIGHT, + autoClose: 1000, + } + ); + setLoading(false) + setApiCall(true) + close() + } + } catch (err) { + console.log(err) + setLoading(false) + } + } + return ( + <> + + + {/*
*/} +
+
+
